Serial number & last 4 digits available"]AllOut[label="Brute-force spam all numbers
Impractical method"]AreaCode[label="Restrict to local area code

Possible matches: 999"]Prefixes[label="Narrow by central office code
Possible matches: 232"]iMessageAPI[label="Filter by iMessage
